required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study Evaluating the Pronostic Value of Vascular Refilling Rate on Mortality in Chronic Kidney Disease Patients on Dialysis
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of the Pronostic Value of Vascular Refilling Rate on Mortality in Chronic Kidney Disease Patients on Dialysis (Stage 5D)

brief_summary.textblock:
Aim of this study is to evaluate in a population of chronic kidney disease patients on dialysis (Stage 5D) during an observational period of 3 years:
- the prognostic value of vascular refilling rate on mortality and on the occurrence of i) cardiovascular events and ii) hospitalization number
- the prognostic value of interdialytic weight gain on mortality and on the occurrence of i) cardiovascular events and ii) hospitalization number
- the prognostic value of perdialytic weight loss on mortality and on the occurrence of i) cardiovascular events and ii) hospitalization number.

primary_outcome.measure: Prognostic value of vascular refilling rate on mortality
primary_outcome.description: The refilling rate will be assessed by the ratio of relative blood volume

secondary_outcome.measure: Prognostic value of interdialytic weight gain
secondary_outcome.description: Prognostic value of interdialytic weight gain

secondary_outcome.description: Prognostic value of interdialytic weight gain

secondary_outcome.measure: Prognostic value of perdialytic weight loss
secondary_outcome.description: Prognostic value of perdialytic weight loss

arm_group.arm_group_label: All patients received conventional dialysis treatment
arm_group.description: All patients received conventional dialysis treatment during an observational period of 3 years

study_pop.textblock: Patients issued from dialysis units (non profit dialysis centers)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
- Chronic Kidney Disease patient on dialysis (stage 5D) since at least september 2017 (3 months prior to study start date)
- Anuric patient
Exclusion criteria:
- Chronic Kidney Disease patient on dialysis with residual kidney function

clinical_study.keyword: Chronic Kidney Disease patient on dialysis (stage 5D)
